Sun.shadow_warning: Ego conflicts and authority struggles may arise. Avoid power plays.
Sun.traditional_remedy: Offer water to the Sun at sunrise. Practice gratitude.
Sun.modern_action: 10 minutes of morning sun exposure. Compliment someone genuinely today.

Moon.shadow_warning: Emotional volatility and oversensitivity. Mind may feel foggy.
Moon.traditional_remedy: Drink water in a silver vessel. Spend time near water.
Moon.modern_action: Journal your feelings for 10 minutes. Hydrate intentionally.

Mercury.shadow_warning: Miscommunication, tech glitches, and scattered thinking ahead.
Mercury.traditional_remedy: Feed green vegetables to cows. Chant mantras.
Mercury.modern_action: Re-read all important messages before sending. No multitasking today.

Venus.traditional_remedy: Donate white clothes or sweets to those in need.
Venus.modern_action: Random act of kindness. Curate your aesthetic environment.

Mars.shadow_warning: Impulsive actions and conflicts may lead to regret. Control aggression.
Mars.traditional_remedy: Donate red lentils. Fast on Tuesdays.
Mars.modern_action: High-intensity workout to channel excess Mars energy. Cold shower.

Jupiter.shadow_warning: Overconfidence and poor judgment. Avoid big commitments today.
Jupiter.traditional_remedy: Respect teachers and elders. Donate yellow items.
Jupiter.modern_action: Learn something new for 30 minutes. Mentor someone.

Saturn.shadow_warning: Heavy energy and feeling 'stuck' in your routine. Delays expected.
Saturn.traditional_remedy: Service to the elderly. Feed crows. Fast on Saturdays.
Saturn.modern_action: Deep Work session: Put phone in another room for 4 hours.

Rahu.shadow_warning: Obsessive desires and illusions may cloud judgment.
Rahu.traditional_remedy: Donate dark blue clothes. Avoid intoxicants.
Rahu.modern_action: Digital detox for 2 hours. Reality-check your desires.

Ketu.shadow_warning: Detachment and confusion about life direction.
Ketu.traditional_remedy: Meditation and spiritual practices. Donate blankets.
Ketu.modern_action: 20 minutes of silent meditation. Declutter one area.

square.general_remedy: Patience and structured approach. Break tasks into smaller steps.

opposition.general_remedy: Seek balance and compromise. Consider the other perspective.

transit_conjunct_time_lord.guidance: This transit directly activates your Year Lord. Pay close attention to themes today.

transit_square_time_lord.guidance: Friction between transiting planet and your Year Lord. Navigate with awareness.

transit_trine_time_lord.guidance: Harmonious flow between transiting energy and your Year Lord's themes.
